mapper.select:
select
from T_CAR_INFO A where A.User_Id = #{userId}

select
from T_CAR_INFO c where c.id in (select t.car_fid from T_HELP_PARTAKE t where t.help_fid=#{helpId})
select sum(t.partake_max) as partake_max from T_CAR_INFO t where t.user_id =#{userId}
